name: Axinite's Chores
description:
Concept Test for a puzzle game inspired by my comic series: Tales of Astrirore.

Meerkek is almost late for work again, Navigate his boss’ nagging and get to work making a potion for a customer. One problem, Meerkek doesn’t remember the recipe. Axinite, in pure-grumpy-mountain-mage-with-no-social-skills fashion, has left a cryptic riddle of items to help Meerkek remember. 

Look around the room for clues as you figure out what to put into the cauldron. Get it right, Axinite will let your near tardiness slide. Get it wrong and someone might start growing feathered tentacles out of their eyes… or something.

Controls: 

Use the mouse to click on dialogue options and ingredient choices.
